biography: Peter Outerbridge is a Canadian film and televison actor, best known for his television roles as Dr. David Sandstr√∂m in "ReGenesis", and as Ari Tasarov in "Nikita", as well as in the movies "Saw VI" as William Easton, and as transsexual Judy in "Better Than Chocolate". He holds a BFA in Acting from the University of Victoria, British Columbia, Canada.
name: Peter Outerbridge
